TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Tân_Tîng-Pho, title = Tân_Tîng-Pho, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tân_Tîng-Pho} }

S.FORM: aicu ti chen chen bu (ciniukukan:陳澄波；pinairangan:Tân Tîng-Pho；rininpungan:チェン チェン ポー), mavan a sinipukeljang a semanzuga a caucau i taiwan tazua ka ripun a djiday mata pitjaivililj a malivulivuan. ka 1926 a caviljan aza zuga nimadju pinaka"嘉義の町はづれ"(pinaka"嘉義街外"tucu nua aya) namapiliq itua seripun a sika masanpitjulj a 帝國美術院 sinan papaljizavan tua nemangamanga (帝展 siayaya uta). avanusika namasan ta sangasangasan a 西畫 taicu a zuga nasetaiwan makaya a pitua imaza i kinakudakudanan na ripun a sihu. saka pitjaivilji timadju rukicapilj tua i 帝展 katua zuma a maretimaljimalji a palisian uta. ka 1947 a caviljan, masa izua aicu a 228 a cinalivatan tazua, timadju namasan ta kitjauvalit a caucau pakata malivulivu katua kukumin sihu, saka nakinuangan ni sivitai imaza i tjaiqayaw a tisiaba i kagi. amin izua 52 a cavilj timadju. kipalikuzan == zuga ==

aico ti chen chen bo (ciniokokan:陳澄波；pinairangan:Tân Tîng-Pho；rininpongan:チェン チェン ポー), mavan a sinipokeljang a semanzoga a caocao i taiwan tazoa ka ripon a djiday mata pitjaivililj a malivolivoan. ka 1926 a caviljan aza zoga nimadjo pinaka"嘉義の町はづれ"(pinaka"嘉義街外"toco noa aya) namapiliq itoa seripon a sika masanpitjolj a 帝國美術院 sinan papaljizavan toa nemangamanga (帝展 siayaya ota). avanosika namasan ta sangasangasan a 西畫 taico a zoga nasetaiwan makaya a pitoa imaza i kinakodakodanan na ripon a siho. saka pitjaivilji timadjo rokicapilj toa i 帝展 katoa zoma a maretimaljimalji a palisian ota. ka 1947 a caviljan, masa izoa aico a 228 a cinalivatan tazoa, timadjo namasan ta kitjaovalit a caocao pakata malivolivo katoa kokomin siho, saka nakinoangan ni sivitai imaza i tjaiqayaw a tisiaba i kagi. amin izoa 52 a cavilj timadjo. kipalikozan == zoga ==
